document.heading: WATER AND SEWER SERVICES RATES AMENDMENT ACT OF 1989

meta.search-text: ENROLLMENT(S) kwiktag ® 103 204 102 5 COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA NOTICE D.C. LAW 8-38 "Water and Sewer Services Rates Amendment Act of 1989 Pursuant to Section 412 of the District of Columbia Self- Government and Governmental Reorganization Act, P. L. 93-198 the Act the Council of the District of Columbia adopted Bill No. 8-108 on first and second readings, June 27, 1989, and July ii, 1989, respectively. Following the signature of the Mayor on July 27, 1989, this legislation was assigned Act No. 8-67, published in the August II, 1989, edition of the D.C. Reg. ister Vol. 36 page 5752) and transmitted to Congress on August 4, 1989 for a 30-day review, in accordance with Section 602(c)(I) of the Act. The Council of the District of Columbia hereby gives notice that the 30-day Congressional Review Period has expired, and therefore, cites this enactment as D.C. Law 8-38, effective October 18, 1989 CLARK Chairman of the Council Dates Cou_nted Durin t_he 30 ressional Review Period: August 4 September 6,7,8,11,12,13,14,15,18,19,20,21,22,25,26,27,28,29 October 2,3,4,5,6,10,11,12,13,16.17 AN ACT CodTfication, District of Columbia Code (1990 Supplement) I.C 8 6 7 IN THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA JUL 7 1989 To amend An Act Making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of such District for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1931, and for other purposes and the Revenue Act of 1975, to revise the schedule of water rates and the charges for sanitary sewer services. BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Water and Sewer Services Rates Amendment Act of 1989 Sec. 2. Section 1 of An Act Making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of such District for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1931, and for other purposes, approved July 3, 1930 (46 Stat. 988; D.C. Code, sec. 43-1522 is amended as follows a) Subparagraph (a)(2)(F) is repealed b) Paragraph (b)(2) is amended by striking the phrase "scheduled or proposed revised rate under subsection (a)(2)(F) or" and inserting the phrase "proposed revised rate under subsection" in its place. Sec. 3. Section 701(b) of the Revenue Act of 1975, effective June 4, 1982 (D.C. Law 1-23; D.C. Code, sec. 43- 1605) is amended as follows a) Paragraph (2) is amended by striking the phrase "186.4 cents, and 205.0 cents" and inserting the phrase "and 186.4 cents" in its place b) Paragraph (2) is amended by striking the phrase "1986, and 1989" and inserting the phrase "and 1986" in its pl ace c) Subparagraph (3)(B) is amended by striking the phrase "scheduled or Section, 43-1522 Section, 43-1605 Enrolled orisins~ Sec. 4. Effective Date. This act shall take effect after a 30-day period of Congressional review following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council of the District of Columbia to override the veto) as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C.
